Name: SHILLELAGH
Components: V,S, M(mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and ac1ubor quarterstaff)
Description: The wood of a c1ubor quarterstaff you are holding isimbued with nature's power. For the duration, you canuse your spellcasting ability instead of Strength forthe atlack and damage rolls of melee attacks usingthat weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomesa d8. The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn'talready. The spell ends ifyou cast it again or ifyou let goof the weapon.
